document_data.name: Thaelin
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/theedverse/2019-04-21 - Largest Dragon Turtles in the Realms}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Thaelin''' ({{Pronounce|THAY|linn|refs=}}) was one of the largest known [[dragon turtle]]s in the history of [[Toril]].
document_data.Description: Thaelin was known to be roughly the size of an island.
document_data.History: Thaelin originally dwelled in water-filled caverns beneath the slopes of the island [[Tharsult]]. When the dragon turtle's plundering of ships eventually threatened the shipping and commerce of the island, they employed a large number of [[wizard]]s who managed to slay the beast.
